title: pdf_template
name: pdf_template
description: An PDF template. For now this is a read-only resource ONLY returning your own templates. It fits the most important use-case: A user can select a print template.

name.description: Name of the template as shown to the user.

kind.description: Kind of object the template can be used for.

language.description: Should be a valid language short-code: de-DE, fr, en-GB; like defined in your account language menu. A multi-language template should belong to a parent. From then on just choose the parent-template and the localized child version is used for printing if the related object(order, invoice,..) has the appropriate language.

created_at.description: Date the object was created in SK. Never changes afterwards

updated_at.description: Date the object was edited in SK.

team_id.description: A team uuid. If set only the team and its parent teams can see the record.

page.title: Page
page.description: In paginated results set the page to look for

per_page.title: Per page
per_page.description: Results per page. Default is 10, max is 100

sort_by.title: Sort by
sort_by.description: Sort the results by the given field

sort.title: Sort
sort.description: Sort the results in ASC or DESC

filter[kind].title: Search by kind
filter[kind].description: Kind of object this template can be used for: invoice, order
